full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### EJ196-222142: Janitorial Services for Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

**Notice Reference:** WS3991242451-Doc4045919851

**Publication Date:** 13 June 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 24 July 2023, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time

**Contract Overview:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites proposals from qualified contractors to provide Janitorial Services for its facility located at 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada.

The selected contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary labor, materials, and equipment for the scope of work, which includes cleaning and maintenance services.

**Mandatory Site Visit:**

A mandatory site visit will be held on 5 July 2023 at 10:00am Eastern Daylight Time. All bidders are required to confirm their attendance and provide the name of the representative who will attend by 29 June 2023, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time. Failure to attend or confirm attendance will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Submission Requirements:**

All bid submissions must be received by the specified closing date and time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact Caroline Richard at caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**

A copy of this notice can be found on the Ariba website at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16568081?extsite=MTY1NjgwODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Bid Evaluation:**

The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price. All bids will be subject to scrutiny and evaluation by PWGSC.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Procurement Category:**

* SRV (Services)

**UNSPC Codes:**

* 72000000 (Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services)
* 76110000 (Cleaning and Janitorial Services)
